Ingredients.3: 0.5 (15.5 ounce) jar prepared salsa con queso

Ingredients.8: 12 (6 inch) white corn tortillas, cut into chips

Directions.1: Line a plate with paper towels.

Directions.2: Combine refried beans and 1/4 cup water in a small saucepan over low heat.

Directions.3: Combine salsa con queso and 2 tablespoons of water in a second saucepan and heat over low heat.

Directions.4: Combine enchilada sauce and mild sauce in a third saucepan and heat over low heat.

Directions.5: Preheat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add tortilla chips to the skillet, making sure to not overcrowd. Cook for 4 minutes, flipping halfway through. Use tongs and transfer chips to the paper towel-lined plate; sprinkle with salt. Repeat with remaining chips.

Directions.6: Divide chips between 4 serving dishes. Scatter beans on top of chips, drizzle with cheese, then drizzle with red sauce. Serve immediately.
